remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的陣列會排除`Condition`和`ContinueOnError`參數。The returned array excludes the `Condition` and `ContinueOnError` parameters. 如果沒有參數傳遞給工作，則這個方法會傳回空陣列。If no parameters are passed to the task, this method returns an empty array.
